title: Composition
text: Remember that to solve f(g(x)), we need to plug in the value of g(x) into the value of $$x$$ in f(x).
speech: Remember that to solve f(g(x)), we need to plug in the value of g(x) into the value of  x  in f(x).

title: Composition
text: We need to plug in g(x), or $$\sqrt{x-2}$$, for the $$x$$ in the function f: $${\sqrt{x+2}}^2+1$$.
speech: We need to plug in g(x), or  the square root of x minus 2 end root , for the  x  in the function f: , the square root of x plus 2 end root, squared plus 1 .
pacedSpeech: We need to plug in g(x), or   the square root of x minus 2 end root
in the function f:  , the square root of x plus 2 end root, squared plus 1

title: Exponents
text: Based off the Order of Operations, the first step is the exponents: $${\sqrt{x+2}}^2=x+2$$.
speech: Based off the Order of Operations, the first step is the exponents:  the square root of x plus 2 end root, squared is equal to x plus 2 .
pacedSpeech: Based off the Order of Operations, the first step is the exponents:   the square root of x plus 2 end root, squared is equal to x plus 2

title: Multiplication
text: Now, our composition function reads $$x+2+1$$. The next step is to add the constants: $$x+2+1=x+3$$.
speech: Now, our composition function reads  x plus 2 plus 1 . The next step is to add the constants:  x, plus 2 plus 1 is equal to x plus 3 .

. The next step is to add the constants:   x, plus 2 plus 1 is equal to x plus 3
